title: Jasmine Ho Qiu’s resume
text:
Professional Expereience

Critical Thinking Game Designer
Lirvana Labs (Learning Companion App)
Menlo Park, CA
October 2023 –
-Helping to build an interactive, AI learning app for children globally (Thailand, Hong Kong, and Virginia) on a 7-member team
-Implementing social-emotional learning models, laying the groundwork for the app’s deployment in educational institutions around the world
-Presenting the application of AI in education at the ASU+GSV AIR SHOW, delivering an impactful talk to a diverse audience of 50+ professionals


Lead Instructor
TechKnowHow (Summer Tech Camp)
Oakland, CA
June 2023 - August 2023
-Taught 20 students innovation utilizing LEGO building blocks and Scratch programming by creating engaging lesson plans and cultivating a supportive learning environment
-Applied age-appropriate teaching methods to accommodate students’ diverse learning styles while still aligning with set curriculum objectives
-Leveraged problem-solving skills to address and resolve classroom or personal conflicts to ensure a safe and enriching summer camp experience for all students


People and Culture Intern
GRID Alternatives (Renewable Energy Firm)
San Diego, CA
June 2022 - August 2022
-Conducted a comprehensive analysis of quantitative DEI data collected over 8 years to streamline and establish clear and transparent company metrics to define the upcoming fiscal year’s goals for all stakeholders
-Collaborated with a team of 4 executives to strategize and implement innovative DEI initiatives, focused on copy-writing and having a progressive approach to implement a new maternity policy maternity policy


Project Management Analyst Intern
StarGazer Enterprise (Consulting Firm)
Oakland, CA
August 2020 - October 2020
-Organized and recorded company-wide financial transactions to ensure the accuracy of accounts payable and accounts receivables on QuickBooks
-Conducted extensive market research on the background and actions of the BART Measure RR Oversight Committee


Junior Consultant
Banteay Srei (Social Advocacy Organization)
Oakland, CA
September 2018 - July 2020
-Developed a community action project by acquiring donations via fundraising, resulting in 50+ free feminine hygiene kits for homeless women in underserved neighborhoods
-Created weekly workshops with PowerPoint, and led discussions on various topics centered around women’s empowerment (ex: Self Defense, Reproductive Rights, Conflict Mediation) to an audience of 30+ students
